title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 898.5 - Application for just compensation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 898.5 - Application for just compensation

State Regulations
A landlord may file with the commission an application for
just compensation within four months following the service by the cable
television company of the notice described in section
898.3
of this Part, or within four
months following the completion of the installation of the cable television
facilities, whichever is later. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
898.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
